data.name: ApiError_GardenHouseValidation_NameIsEmpty
data.value: Name for garden house has to be provided.

data.name: ApiError_GardenHouse_FailedToAddToDb
data.value: Could not add garden house to database.

data.name: ApiError_GardenHouseValidation_HouseIdNotProvided
data.value: Id has to be provided to remove garden house.

data.name: ApiError_GardenHouseValidation_HouseWithIdNotFound
data.value: Could not find garden house with provided id in database.

data.name: ApiError_GardenHouse_FailedToRemoveFromDb
data.value: Could not remove garden house from database.

data.name: ApiError_GardenHouseValidation_IdToUpdateNotProvided
data.value: Could not update garden house. Id has to be provided.

data.name: ApiError_GardenHouseValidation_NameAndDescriptionToUpdateEmpty
data.value: Could not update garden house. Provide either new name or new description.

data.name: ApiError_GardenHouse_FailedToUpdateInDb
data.value: Could not update garden house in database.

data.name: ApiError_GardenHouseValidation_IdToAddImageNotProvided
data.value: Could not add image to garden house. Garden house id has to be provided.

data.name: ApiError_GardenHouseValidation_ImagePathNotProvided
data.value: Could not add image to garden house. Image paths not provided.

data.name: ApiError_GardenHouse_AddImagesFailed
data.value: Could not add images to garden house. Database error.

data.name: ApiError_GardenHouseValidation_ImageIdsToDeleteNotProvided
data.value: Could not delete images from garden house. Ids not provided.

data.name: ApiError_GardenHouse_FailedToDeleteImagesFromDb
data.value: Could not remove images from garden house. Database error.

data.name: ApiError_GardenHouse_ImagesNotFound
data.value: Could not find images with provided ids.

data.name: ApiError_GardenHouse_FailedToGetHouses
data.value: Could not get all house models from api.
